name: Ghost Story (Ha_ruh)
description:
This project was created as an exercise for me to learn the first steps in Unity! 

It's focus is the narrative more than gameplay, and it's scope was adapted to be completed in around 3 months.

Hope you like it! More art on insta @ha_ruh

A free behind-the-scenes document will be available here soon!

Songs used:

Follow You/Imagine Dragons [Music Box] by R3 music box

Imagine Dragons - Follow You (Instrumental Cover) [ACCURATE] by axel.mp4
